name: World of Tanks

results.description: Version for installing the Wargaming Center under Windows 7, to fix the start problems under Windows 10.

task.name: wineexec
task.exclude_processes: explorer.exe rpcss.exe winedevice.exe plugplay.exe WargamingGameUpdater.exe WoTLauncher.exe

results.name: World of Tanks
results.content:
files:
- game:
    filename: WoT_internet_install_asia.exe
    url: https://wot.gcdn.co/na/files/WoT_internet_install_na.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Games/World_of_Tanks/WoTLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /CLOSEAPPLICATIONS
    description: Installing World of Tanks
    exclude_processes: explorer.exe rpcss.exe winedevice.exe plugplay.exe WargamingGameUpdater.exe
      WoTLauncher.exe
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts win7
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Wine to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_runtime: false
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1920x1080
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin

content:
count: 1
next: null
previous: null

    \    executable: game\n    name: wineexec\n    prefix: $GAMEDIR\n- task:\n   \

    \ winetricks\n    prefix: $GAMEDIR\nsystem:\n  disable_runtime: false\n  env:\n\

  created_at: '2018-07-23T06:01:56.127000Z'
  description: Version for installing the Wargaming Center under Windows 7, to fix
    the start problems under Windows 10.
  draft: false
  game_id: 85
  game_slug: world-of-tanks
  gogid: null
  gogslug: ''
  humblestoreid: ''
  id: 9330
  name: World of Tanks
  notes: ''
  published: true
  published_by: 20548
  rating: ''
  runner: wine
  script:
    files:
    - game:
        filename: WoT_internet_install_asia.exe
        url: https://wot.gcdn.co/na/files/WoT_internet_install_na.exe
    game:
      arch: win64
      exe: drive_c/Games/World_of_Tanks/WoTLauncher.exe
      prefix: $GAMEDIR
    installer:
    - task:
        arch: win64
        description: Creating Wine prefix
        name: create_prefix
        prefix: $GAMEDIR
    - task:
        args: /VERYSILENT /CLOSEAPPLICATIONS
        description: Installing World of Tanks
        exclude_processes: explorer.exe rpcss.exe winedevice.exe plugplay.exe WargamingGameUpdater.exe
          WoTLauncher.exe
        executable: game
        name: wineexec
        prefix: $GAMEDIR
    - task:
        arch: win64
        name: winekill
        prefix: $GAMEDIR
    - task:
        app: corefonts win7
        arch: win32
        description: Setting Wine to Windows 7
        name: winetricks
        prefix: $GAMEDIR
    system:
      disable_runtime: false
      env:
        DXVK_HUD: 0
        __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
        __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    wine:
      Desktop: true
      WineDesktop: 1920x1080
      dxvk: true
      overrides:
        xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  slug: world-of-tanks-na-dxvk-win7
